definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Show all articles on this topic.
sentences.chinese: 顯示所有關於這個主題的文章。

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 減少他們在與主題不相關的細節上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: Theme song from Saiunkoku Monogatari anime.
Yes. A specific subject-selection system allows the training coordinator to select relevant subjects for each target group.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據每一個目標羣設定相關的培訓主題。

sentences.english: Wandering is one of the main themes in TIAN Han's early plays.
sentences.chinese: 漂泊是田漢早期劇作主題之一。

sentences.english: This allows you to change the emoticon theme that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 這將允許您變更要使用的笑臉主題。

sentences.english: Two golden curves across the card surface add an artistic touch to the design.
sentences.chinese: 另外卡面設計以兩道金色弧線爲主題，極富藝術感。

sentences.english: When I was listening to the final theme song, my heart was kind of stirred and could not calm down.
sentences.chinese: 聽着最後的主題曲，我的心情久久不能平靜。

sentences.english: Development and ecology are two main theme in urban design and construction in Beijing nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 發展與生態是當前北京城市建設的兩大突出主題。

sentences.english: A solo violin carried the theme in “The Fixer”;
sentences.chinese: 在《暗影行動》中，主題曲由小提琴獨奏出。

sentences.english: It's a theme that we'll see coming up in many of the stories.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的很多故事中，我們都可以看到這個主題。

sentences.english: This topic explains how to sort your recordset.
sentences.chinese: 本主題說明如何對記錄集排序。

sentences.english: Still, the issue James raised back in 1905 remains pertinent.
sentences.chinese: 然而詹姆斯在1905年提出的主題然仍值得討論。

sentences.english: Again, you'll have to choose iamges relevant to your own topic.
sentences.chinese: 還是如此，你得選擇和自己主題相關的圖片。

sentences.english: First, we should prepare well for the thematic projects.
sentences.chinese: 一是把各主題項目做好。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to revolve around/to center on (an issue)
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
axis/principal axis (in mechanics, optics, botany etc)/main axle (of engine)
